Located on the Lakeland Linder International Airport (KLAL)
Our business office hours are 8:00am â€“ 5:00pm EST Monday through Friday.
The Aerospace Discovery Museum at the Florida Air Museumâ€™s hours are typically:
Monday â€“ Saturday 10:00am â€“ 4:00pm
Sunday 12:00pm â€“ 4:00pm

Driving Directions
By way of summary, we are located on the southwest corner of Lakeland Linder International Airport in Lakeland, FL. The Aerospace Discovery at The Florida Air Museum is located at the entrance to the SUN â€˜n FUN Expo campus.
From Interstate 4 â€“
Take County Line Road (Exit 25) south approximately five miles to West Pipkin Road. Turn left on West Pipkin Road, left again on Medulla Road, and proceed approximately Â½ mile to Aerospace Discovery at the Florida Air Museum on the right.
From Highway 60 â€“
Take County Line Road north to West Pipkin Road, and turn right. Turn left on Medulla Road, and proceed approximately Â½ mile to the Aerospace Discovery at the Florida Air Museum on the right.
From Lakeland â€“
Take Pipkin Road west to Medulla Road and turn right.
